I'd like to show you my latest development in Aircraft safety:

**The Mark X Cockpit**

![c9uYT2v.png](http://i.imgur.com/c9uYT2v.png)

Boasting the safest technology advancements for increased pilot survivability. Comes with a flight stick, LED touchscreen, an Ejection seat, and Cupholders!

![1lxe0fS.png](http://i.imgur.com/1lxe0fS.png)

\*Test cockpit on a Defiance fighter\*
Wow, I have never seen a custom cockpit better than this one. A first person view in that would be awesome!

Thank you! It was inspired from a video by Marex333.

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/Uf32JqdJeWM?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

Very nice! +rep. It looks similar to what I did. I replaced it with air brakes because whenever the brake was activated, they would extend, even after removing them from them from the action groups It's less of a problem now:

![uBo4PJa.png](http://i.imgur.com/uBo4PJa.png)

I used the new radiator panels. They seemed to slow down the heating up of Kerbals when under reentry velocities

**Edited <time datetime="2015-07-02T03:26:35Z" title="07/02/2015 03:26  AM" data-short="9 yr">July 2, 2015</time> by NeatCrown**

Hmm. I might have to implement the radiator into my next series of Cockpits if you wouldn't mind. I do like the idea and it looks pretty cool ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
I made a thread for all of my future cockpits ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
